title: Toepfer PWA Prototype
subtitle: This app serves as a prototype for a progressive web app based on React.
homepageText: This prototype is being developed step by step. The application can be installed as an app on your device.
exampleActionAlert: A function could be started here later.
installNotSupported: Installation is not supported by this browser.
iosHintText: To install this app, open the Share icon in Safari and select "Add to Home Screen".

language.title: Select Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application. Your selection will be saved automatically.
